name: Roger 2 Input Data File
summary: A ROG file is a data file created by Roger 2, a civil engineering program used mainly in Ireland. It contains data in the proprietary Roger (ROG) format, which may include material properties, environmental factors, and structural parameters. Roger 2 users save ROG files in Roger 2 to preserve engineering project data and can load them back into the software to perform calculations and simulations.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
